about_the_game:
GENRE

A strategy card game in the FFA format.

FOR WHOM

Our game is designed specially for those who appreciate the ability to think strategically, who look for intellectual challenges and want to play something special.

GAMEPLAY

Six players confront each other for leadership through efficient resource allocation and tactical use of the abilities of Heroes and Disciples.

FEATURES AND PRINCIPLES:



WE CARE FOR THE COMMUNITY
Suggest ideas, discuss changes and influence the development of the game.
Taking care of the players is our top priority.


NEXT GENERATION GAMEPLAY
Deep strategies, multiple opportunities and the unique character of each game.
You can find all this in a next generation game which turns the concept of the card entertainment upside down.


AFFORDABLE AND FREE
Immerse yourself into a fascinating world absolutely for free.
There is no need to build decks.
Play freely and enjoy every moment of the game without a care.


FREEDOM OF COLLECTING
You will be able to change the visual style of different aspects of the game for yourself.
It will be possible to trade collectibles with other players.


DEVELOPMENT OF CYBERSPORTS
Full-fledged in-game tournaments where virtual maps become the canvas for real sporting feats.
Become a part of the cybersports evolution.


SKILL OVER RANDOM
In this game, pure random yields in the face of true masters of card battles.
Exalt your skill over random.

FUTURE CONTENT:


Competitive and Tournament modes

Duo mode

Game editor and Community modes

Saving and reviewing game recordings

Game assistant and detailed statistics for players

P2P market

Customization of the game interface and cards

System of Guilds

In-game achievements

TopDeck Studio

Passion for games. Respect for gamers.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with shader model 4.0 capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: FFA CARDS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11
